summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to "whistleblower" reporting and protection; amending the City's whistleblower protection program in response to the enactment of Chapter 42.41 RCW; amending Sections 4.20.800, 4.20.810, 4.20.820, 4.20.830, 4.20.840, and 4.20.850 of the Seattle Municipal Code, and adding a new Section 4.20.860 in connection therewith.
